section.title: slr_sizeInfo
section.para: This string property is used to associate profile specific information to inline elements so that size information can be decoupled from the native format or represented when the native data is not available in the JLIFF document. It can be used on both inline elements and structural elements to provide information on things like GUI dialog or control sizes, expected padding or margins to consider for size, what font is used for contained text and so on. This attribute is only allowed on the ec element if that element has the isolated attribute set to "yes". Otherwise the string property on the paired sc element also cover its partner ec element.

Value description: Interpretation of the value is dependent on selected xlr_generalProfile. It must represent information related to how the object it is attached to contributes to the size of the text or entity in which it occurs or represents.
Used in: file, group, unit, pc, sc, ec, and ph.

listitem.para: This string property must not be specified if and only if slr_sizeInfoRef is used. They must not be specified at the same time.
